channel.title: ZDR ( Z Diddy Source) Its A Question
channel.description:
1. in the game, when i look at other people i only see "attack", no trade,folow,walk here, ect... how do i fix this, can u post a code???
2. Can any one give me a link or anything to the ZDR client, cause i cannot see teletabs,godswords, or dragon armor, or anything.?
3. if theres no zdr client out there, wuts the closest one to it?
tyvm, respond asap.. please :(
